text: is a Japanese lake in Shikotsu-Toya National Park on the island of Hokkaidō, Japan. ==History== The 2008 G8 Summit was held at Lake Tōya.G8 Hokkaido Toyako Summit, "Overview of the Summit" . Retrieved 2012-12-31. ==Geography== It is the ninth largest lake in Japan.Summit, "Overview of Toyako (Lake Toya)" .
